casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey Neal DUKE. No. 57A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2005. William N. Farrell, Jr., Senior Deputy Attorney General, Mikko Red Arrow, G. Patrick Murphy, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael K. Lands, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of April 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed until May 4, 2005. Defendant (Duke) shall have up to and Including the 4th day of May 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of April 2005."
